articles.title: Billionaire Rahul Bhatia To Helm IndiGo After Surprise Swing To Profit - NDTV
articles.description: Rahul Bhatia, the billionaire co-founder of IndiGo, is taking on a newly-created executive position of managing director at the company, after the biggest budget carrier in Asia by market value posted a surprise quarterly profit.
articles.content:
IndiGo Chief Executive Officer Ronojoy Dutta in November said the carrier is 'unlikely' to raise funds
